title: Associate Software Engineer
description:
We're looking for
 **Associate Software Engineers** 
 !
   

  

**Salary** 
 : INR 10,00,000 \\- 12,00,000 / year
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Design, develop, and implement automation solutions to reduce manual effort and operational costs
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to build scalable and secure software solutions
* Write clean, maintainable code; conduct code reviews and troubleshoot software issues
* Support cloud infrastructure management and ensure compliance with security standards
* Participate actively in Agile ceremonies and support continuous improvement initiatives
* Automation tools that enhance self\\-service and reduce operational spend
* Scalable, secure software solutions aligned with business needs
* Comprehensive documentation and user support materials
* High\\-quality code delivered through CI/CD pipelines and tested for reliability


**Eligibility**
* This is an entry\\-level job


 (\\*Note: This is a requirement for one of Scoutit's clients)

title: Software Engineer
description:
We're looking for
 **Software Engineers** 
 who will design, develop, and maintain innovative, customer\\-centric, high\\-performance, secure, and robust solutions.
   

  

**Salary** 
 : INR 25,00,000 \\- 30,00,000 / year
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Engineer software, scripts, and tools within a feature team, producing high\\-quality and critical solutions that add business value.
* Participate in all phases of the software lifecycle, including development, enhancement, maintenance, and decommissioning.
* Collaborate to optimise the software engineering capability and ensure adherence to programming best practices.
* Design, produce, test, and implement software solutions that are scalable, secure, and efficient.
* Integrate Power Platform solutions with enterprise systems using custom connectors, APIs, and cloud services.


**Eligibility**
* 2 years of experience


 (\\*Note: This is a requirement for one of Scoutit's clients)

title: Java Software Engineer
description:
We're looking for
 **Java** 
**Software Engineers** 
**!**
**Salary** 
 : INR 25,00,000 \\- 30,00,000 / year
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Producing complex and critical software rapidly and of high quality which adds value to the business
* Working in permanent teams who are responsible for the full life cycle, from initial development, through enhancement and maintenance to replacement or decommissioning
* Collaborating to optimise our software engineering capability
* Designing, producing, testing and implementing our working software solutions
* Working across the life cycle, from requirements analysis and design, through coding to testing, deployment and operations


**Eligibility**
* 2 years of experience
* Experience in Java, Python, Node.js, microservices, design patterns and API development
* Experience of DevOps and Agile methodology and associated toolsets


 (\\*Note: This is a requirement for one of Scoutit's clients)

title: Web Developer Intern
description:
**Web Developer Intern (Unpaid)** 




**Company:** 
 Webs IT Solution
 



**Location:** 
 Remote
 



**Duration:** 
 3 Months
 



**Employment Opportunity:** 
 Potential full\\-time role based on performance \\+ Certificate of Internship
 



**About Webs IT Solution** 




 Webs IT Solution is a technology and innovation organization offering hands\\-on training and project\\-based internships in software development, web technologies, AI, data, and cybersecurity. The company focuses on bridging the gap between academic learning and industry requirements through live projects and expert mentorship.
 



**Role Overview** 




 As a Web Developer Intern, you will work on designing, developing, and maintaining dynamic websites and web applications. This internship is ideal for students or graduates who are passionate about coding, UI design, and building responsive web solutions from concept to deployment.
 



**Key Responsibilities** 



* Develop and maintain responsive websites using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks such as React.js, Bootstrap, or Tailwind CSS
* Work with backend technologies such as Node.js, Django, or PHP for full\\-stack development
* Collaborate with designers to create clean, user\\-friendly web interfaces
* Integrate APIs and manage efficient client–server communication
* Optimize websites for performance, speed, and SEO best practices
* Debug and resolve technical issues to ensure a smooth user experience



**Requirements** 



* Currently pursuing or completed a Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, IT, or related fields
* Proficiency in HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript with basic knowledge of frontend frameworks
* Familiarity with backend technologies such as Node.js, Python (Flask/Django), or PHP
* Understanding of databases like MySQL or MongoDB and Git version control
* Strong problem\\-solving skills and creativity in design implementation



**What You Will Gain** 



* Certificate of Internship
* Hands\\-on experience working on real\\-world web projects with live deployment
* Mentorship from experienced developers and designers
* Opportunity to build a strong, professional web development portfolio
* Networking and placement assistance post\\-internship
* Potential full\\-time role based on performance
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting, IT System Training and Support, and E-Learning Providers
